title: Na servers down last 2 hours+
body: after the new patch 6.16, i was getting stuck on login queue. i tried again after 15 mins, and the server status of na then said unavailable. can you please inform me when might the servers get back?

replies.body: The servers, more specifically the *login servers* that were preventing you from logging in are back up! Let me know if you still have issues logging in so I can assist you further. :)
Look for a post titled "riot compensation for downed server" and spread the word
